sense.gloss: to take in, to bring in, to adopt (e.g. behaviour), to introduce
to win over, to please, to curry favour with, to flatter
to defraud of, to swindle, to embezzle
to be busy, to be in confusion, to have trouble

sdata.j: ↑雨↑↓あめ↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓りはじめると、↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑息子↑↓むすこ↓に↑洗濯↑↓せんたく↓↑物↑↓ぶつ↓を↑取↑↓|と↓り↑込↑↓こ↓む|ように↑言↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: When it began to rain, she told her son to take in the washing.

sdata.j: あっ。↑布団↑↓ふとん↓↑取↑↓|と↓り↑込↑↓こ↓む|の↑忘↑↓わす↓れてた。
sdata.e: Oh, I forgot to bring in the futons.
